rooms.description: Central open space with floor-to-ceiling windows on the south and east facades to maximize natural light in accordance with Vastu principles.
rooms.Vastu_notes: Place seating arrangement along the eastern wall for energy flow.

rooms.description: Adjacent to living room, designed for communal activities. Incorporates Chettinad style detailing.
rooms.Vastu_notes: Align dining table near the center of the room to maintain harmony.

rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with large windows for optimal sunlight. Includes built-in wardrobes and a private balcony.
rooms.Vastu_notes: Bed should face the north-east direction to promote tranquility.

rooms.description: Modern kitchen with Chettinad style elements, well-ventilated and designed near the eastern wall.
rooms.Vastu_notes: Place sink on the north side of the kitchen to ensure water flows away from food preparation area.

rooms.description: Functional bathroom with sufficient ventilation and privacy, adjacent to master bedroom.
rooms.Vastu_notes: Ensure proper exhaust ventilation in the south-eastern corner as per Vastu for negative energy removal.

rooms.description: Compact guest room with essential amenities, designed to maintain symmetry.
rooms.Vastu_notes: Align bed parallel to the north wall for balanced energies.

openings.description: Large windows to maximize daylight and adhere to Chettinad aesthetic.
Main entrance with Chettinad-style door detailing.
Floor-to-ceiling window for natural lighting and ventilation.

notes: This design is a conceptual representation of a single-story 1BHK bungalow incorporating Chettinad architectural details, floor-to-ceiling windows for enhanced natural lighting, and Vastu-compliant spatial layout. Adjustments may be needed based on site-specific requirements.
